title: UPDATE `ts_user_job`SET`area_str`=CONCAT(SUBSTRING
content:
UPDATE  `ts_user_job` SET `area_str`=SUBSTRING_INDEX(area_str,' ',1) WHERE ( area_str!='' AND SUBSTRING_INDEX(area_str,' ',1) is NOT NULL AND CONCAT( SUBSTRING_INDEX(area_str,' ',1),' ',SUBSTRING_INDEX(area_str,' ',1) ) = SUBSTRING_INDEX(area_str,' ',2) AND CONCAT( SUBSTRING_INDEX(area_str,' ',1),' ',SUBSTRING_INDEX(area_str,' ',1),' ',SUBSTRING_INDEX(area_str,' ',1) ) = area_str );


 UPDATE  `ts_user_job` SET `area_str`=CONCAT(SUBSTRING_INDEX(area_str,' ',1),' ',SUBSTRING_INDEX(area_str,' ',-1)) WHERE ( area_str!='' AND SUBSTRING_INDEX(area_str,' ',1) is NOT NULL AND CONCAT( SUBSTRING_INDEX(area_str,' ',1),' ',SUBSTRING_INDEX(area_str,' ',1) ) = SUBSTRING_INDEX(area_str,' ',2) );




 UPDATE  `ts_user` SET `location`=SUBSTRING_INDEX(location,' ',1),`city`='',`area`='' WHERE ( location!='' AND SUBSTRING_INDEX(location,' ',1) is NOT NULL AND CONCAT( SUBSTRING_INDEX(location,' ',1),' ',SUBSTRING_INDEX(location,' ',1) ) = SUBSTRING_INDEX(location,' ',2) AND CONCAT( SUBSTRING_INDEX(location,' ',1),' ',SUBSTRING_INDEX(location,' ',1),' ',SUBSTRING_INDEX(location,' ',1) ) = location );

  UPDATE  `ts_user` SET `location`=CONCAT(SUBSTRING_INDEX(location,' ',1),' ',SUBSTRING_INDEX(location,' ',-1)),`city`=`area`,`area`='' WHERE ( location!='' AND SUBSTRING_INDEX(location,' ',1) is NOT NULL AND CONCAT( SUBSTRING_INDEX(location,' ',1),' ',SUBSTRING_INDEX(location,' ',1) ) = SUBSTRING_INDEX(location,' ',2) );
